backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods defined.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing UI changes for adding and displaying a couple photo on the homepage.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of key frontend files including App, ValentineModal, global styles, and Tailwind config.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining color tokens and dark mode behavior.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main homepage UI with decorative hearts, couple photo, escalating Yes button, fading No button, error message, and modal trigger.
frontend/src/components/ValentineModal.t: Celebration modal with hearts, image, message, and close behavior via click or Escape key.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity auth context handling login, logout, stored identities, and provider setup.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Valentine-themed OKLCH color variables, dark mode values, and animation utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React entry point initializing QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config defining dark mode, content paths, theme extensions for colors, layout, fonts, shadows, and animations, plus plugin setup.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing a Valentineâ€™s website with button interactions, modal behavior, image requirements, and tracked feature definitions.
